## Scatterplot av alle deltakere i Boston marathon 2019

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(exscidata)
library(tidyverse)


  exscidata::boston |>
  filter(year == 2019) |>
  
  ggplot(aes(x = age, y = seconds)) +
    geom_point()

```
